column3: @laanwj This also contains a string change!\n

Just found out why this is enough http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms738527%28v=vs.85%29.aspx :\n\n> The maximum length, in bytes, of the string returned in the buffer pointed to by the name parameter is dependent on the namespace provider, but this string must be 256 bytes or less. So if a buffer of 256 bytes is passed in the name parameter and the namelen parameter is set
That is mentioned in the commit message :).\n
Hah oops, had only read the github post\n
